Reviews.Title: if you want a basic computer this is it
Reviews.Author: noreen
Reviews.Content: support is not really there  basic as basic can be  advertisement pop ups non stop..... really dell?????the ops is windows 8 not 8.1 or pro. it offers no touch screen or swipe capabilities... if it does its not easily sought out.Well you get what you pay for.... be wary!

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Paula Johnson
Reviews.Content: I bought this computer for a Bachelor's Program online.  It is very slow, and often the cursor just freezes and I have to shut the computer down to get it to work.  Very dissatisfied.  I will definitely go back to HP.  I also ordered a touch screen and it does not have a touch screen.  So disappointed.  Don't waste your time on this one!

Reviews.Title: MY PRIDE AND JOY
Reviews.Author: mystery reader
Reviews.Content: It came it on time, was what I expected, and works wells.  Dell ususally does a good job with it products what else can I expect
